main event: An object similar to an aircraft was observed falling straight down to the ground, possibly a weather balloon, on July 1, 1955.
interesting points: The object was reported as silver in color.,It was estimated to have fallen from around 32,000 feet.,The observation lasted approximately 1 minute.,The sighting occurred 50 miles southeast of Sacramento, California.,The potential explanation suggested was that it was a punctured weather balloon.
witness description: fighter pilot from Travis Air Force Base
